message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000.  It's a great deal for both of us. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product and your willingness to negotiate. However, $9,000 is simply too far below my minimum asking price. I'm willing to come down to $11,000 to meet you halfway. Let me know if you're willing to work with me at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,000, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $10,500. Can we meet in the middle at $10,750?
